I noticed that suddenly the episodes released are now less than half the size of what they used to be. New codec?
Yeah, now most rip groups are encoding HDTV version in x264 and format mp4, with a higher resolution (720x404). This is the explanation that the size is less.
The quality is taking a hit with this new smaller encodings.  I hope the groups realize this and make these optional and not the standard.
